metadata.Author: Raul Jimenez
metadata.Readme: This package enables download of reports by non-admin users by replacing the /sitecore/shell/download.aspx page The original one is saved as download_original.aspx in case you need to revert back to it. In addition it also creates a new config file in the include folder which can turn on/off the download for non-admin users. This modified download page could be considered a potential security risk.
